items.text: 130kph, shorter outside off, he mistimes a pull to mid on
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Dixit: "Any update on Ngidi?" None yet. Will post something as soon as we hear.
items.text: 133kph, good length, on off, he defends on the front foot
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: angled into leg, 130kph, he turns this around the corner behind square
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: 130kph, shorter outside off, he sits back and waits and pulls with control but with no timing behind square
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "The ball is sticking in the surface. The medium pacers and spinners of Bangladesh are gonna be a handful given South Africa's vulnerability against spin."
items.text: 130kph, back of a length, outside off, he's back and running this with an open face to third man
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: 127kph, full on leg stump, he clips this neatly into the gap at midwicket
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: 139kph, full angled into off, he drives neatly but straight to mid on
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 134kph, back of a length, outside off, he leaves as it climbs through to de Kock
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 138kph, good length, he's defending from the crease
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 138kph, shorter and wider and he cuts but straight to backward point
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 136kph, short and wide and he cracks a cut shot to deep point
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: 135kph, chest high short ball, he pulls with control behind square to the sweeper
items.postText: Ovy: "Old guards of Bangladesh cricket are in crease. Best two batsman to build the innings from a good start! "
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: 128kph, good length, on off, he defends on the front foot
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: 132kph, fuller, he drives getting a thick inside edge to fine leg
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: 129kph, short and wide, he is back and running this to third man with a controlled late cut
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short and down leg, he tried to pull and misses but it's not called wide
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: 132kph, angled into off, he turns this from off the stumps behind square to fine leg
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: 126kph, very full angled into off, he drives firmly straight to mid on
items.postText: Drinks Great start by Bangladesh. Soumya was outstanding at the top of the order. South Africa didn't extract the pace and bounce they were hoping for. Shashank Kishore will step in for the first time today.
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Thank you, Alex. Great start, then a fightback from South Africa. Even contest so far. Bangladesh couldn't have asked for a better batting pair to sustain the early momentum. Let's see if these two can provide them that. Morris is getting steep bounce. He'll continue
items.text: welcome back, says Shakib as he drives this on the up to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: takes him on with the pull, absolutely no control whatsoever as he took his eyes off but boy, this flies over the ropes at fine leg. It's a big boundary there, the fine leg fielder was in with a chance for a split-second but it kept going away.
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

items.text: helps the pull along to deep square
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: rides the bounce as he bunts this down to third man
items.postText: Mayank Agarwal: "Watching these two play reminds me of Sanga and Mahela. Good friends and excellent players. "
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: floats this on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
items.postText: Azweer: "Comparing to other experienced Asian teams, Bangladesh have given a very good response so far. Afghanistan have had a decent show last night."
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: takes on the pull and hits this all along the ground to deep square leg
items.postText: Mustafa Moudi: "Sorry For being off-Topic but I just want to Wish Steven Smith a Very Happy Birthday and request all the Cricket Fans in the World to Move on from the Ball-Tampering Saga, he has already suffered a lot and regrets his action. Give him a new chance as he enters a new decade in his life."
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Markram with his gentle offspin from around the stumps
items.text: tossed up on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
